game.name: Rogue Reigns
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Rogue Reigns is a dark fantasy rogue-like deck-builder that weaves together the haunting narrative depth and corrupted world-building of games like Elden Ring with the strategic card combat of Slay the Spire. Fight, discover, die and repeat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rogue Reigns is a dark fantasy rogue-like deck-builder that weaves together the haunting narrative depth and corrupted world-building of games like Elden Ring with the strategic card combat of Slay the Spire. Fight, discover, die and repeat.
